htmlform.formName: MH Routine encounter - Psychotherapy approach visit
htmlform.formDescription: MH Routine encounter - Psychotherapy approach visit

variant.value: Caregiver or CHW Involved in case:
(What is the primary reason for current visit?
Uburwayi bw’Imbamutima iri hejuru cyane(Ibyishimo birenze by’uburwayi)
Kumva ko ibintu byagenda uko ashaka
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bugaragarira ku bimenyetso by’umubiri
Does the patient meet criteria for PM+ Psychotherapy intervention
Ese umurwayi afite ibimenyetso bituma agomba guhabwa ubuvuzi hakoreshejwe Ibiganiro
If YES, what is the reason
Was confidentiality and rapport established with patient
Ese umuforomo yabashije kubahiriza amahame y’ibanga n’icyizere hamwe n’umurwayi
Does the patient understand structure and goals of PM+
Ese umuforomo yabashije kubahiriza amahame y’ibanga n’icyizere hamwe n’umurwayi
Is the patient able to commit to attending the remaining four sessions
Ese umurway yiyemeje kuzitabira gahunda y’ibiganiro bine(4) bikurikira
If NO, what is the plan for management
Niba ari hoya,Ni iki giteganywa mu kumufasha
Did the patient understand benefits of deep breathing/relaxation exercise
Ese umurwayi asobanukiwe n’akamaro ko guhumeka mu buryo buruhura yinjiza umuka munda no kuwusohora
Was the patient able to perform exercise appropriately
Ese umurwayi yasobanukiwe kandi akora neza umwitozo wo guhumeka
Guhangana n’ibibazo hashingiwe ku mitekerereze n’imyitwarire
What specific skills were discussed during this visit
Ni ubuhe buryo bwo guhangana n’ibibazo bwaganiriweho muri iki kiganiro
Kubaka ubushobozi mu rwego rw’ubufasha mbonezamibanire
Did the patient understand skill/concept discussed during this session
Ese umurwayi yacengewe n’ibyaganiriweho muri icyo kiganiro
Ese ibishobora kugorana mu guhangana n’ibibazo byaganiriweho
Is patient willing to practice using PM+ skill this week
Ese umurwayi yiteguye gukoresha ubumenyi yakuye mu biganiro muri icyi cyumweru
Is the patient able to apply PM+ skills and techniques to manage their problems
Ese umurwayi ashoboye gukoresha ubumenyi n’ingamba yakuye mu biganiro mu guhangana n’ibibazo bye
If NO, what are the challenges
Niba ari hoya ni izihe mbogamizi afite
Patient did not understand how to manage problem / use skills
Umurwayi ntiyasobanukiwe n’ubumenyi ndetse n’ingamaba zo guhangana n’ibibazo
Ibibazo bye byarahindutse kuva igihe aherukira mu biganiro
Ibibazo bye byarahindutse kuva igihe aherukira mu biganiro
Ese umurwayi atekereza cg agerageza ibijyanye no kwiyahura
If YES, please complete suicide assessment form
Niba ari yego, Uzuza Ifishi isuzuma ibyago byo kwiyahura
PLEASE USE SEPARATE FORM FOR DIAGNOSES, MEDICATIONS, and INVESTIGATIONS. Next visit Date
KURIKIZAHO IFISHI YIHARIYE IJYANYE N’UBURWAYI-IMITI N’IBIZAMINI. Italiki yo kugaruka

section.headerCode: Mental Status Exam / Ikizamini ku buzima bwo mu mutwe
PM+ Psychotherapy / PM + Psychothérapie/IBIGANIRO: GUHANGANA N’IBIBAZO HASHINGIWE KU MITEKEREREZE N’IMYITWARIRE
